aboutme.about-me: Hi i'm Santiago, Frontend Developer. I consider my self a calm, respectful and resilient person. My most solid knowledge, i have in React, but i feel great working in Next.js, TypeScript, Angular and other technologies as well.

pokemon.name: Guess the Pokemon App
pokemon.desc: In this application we visualize a silhouette of the pokemon, we have to guess which pokemon it is

piFood.name: I.P Recipes App
piFood.desc: Application developed on a recipes API. We have filters, pagination and a form to create our custom recipe.

ecommerce.desc: Application on a store, in this we have different species of products, a shopping cart and a means of payment to make the purchase.

flights.name: Flights App
flights.desc: Application developed on a flight api, in which all available trips to free dates are displayed. The application has payment methods to buy the ticket.

foods-app.name: Food App
foods-app.desc: Food app, with filters, login, logout and a Google login made with Firebase and a form to create a new food.

weather.name: Weather App
weather.desc: Weather app, you can put a name of your city, and i give you how is the weather in that city.

goals.name: Goals 2023 App
goals.desc: In this application we can put all of our goals for this year and when we complete the objetive we can cross it off

game.name: Rock-Papper-Scissors App
game.desc: It's a rock-paper-scissors game, where i developed a CPU to play with someone.
